title: Derailed, Ep. 2: Every Single Dime
description: Almost a decade after it was first unveiled, the Great Recession and President Barack Obama's federal stimulus bill gave Wisconsin's plan for a high-speed rail line new life.
author: web-team@wpr.org (Wisconsin Public Radio)
media:credit: President Barack Obama signs the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act

itunes:summary: Almost a decade after it was first unveiled, the Great Recession and President Barack Obama's federal stimulus bill gave Wisconsin's plan for a high-speed rail line new life.
